languages.text: "Довольно, Нэми". {n}Энрих неодобрительно хмурится.{/n} "Ты уже не ребенок. Прекрати злить людей глупыми стишками. Простите мою сестру, Лорд-капитан. Это было неуместно".

traits.locale_text: "Довольно, Нэми". {n}Энрих Монтэг неодобрительно хмурится.{/n} "Ты уже не ребенокю. Прекрати подвергать свою жизнь опасности глупыми стишками".

languages.text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."
languages.original_text: "Довольно, Нэми". {n}Энрих неодобрительно хмурится.{/n} "Ты уже не ребенок. Прекрати злить людей глупыми стишками. Простите мою сестру, Лорд-капитан. Это было неуместно".

traits.locale_text: "Nemi, this is enough." {n}Enrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore. Stop bothering people with silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."
"Nemi, this is enough." {n}Enrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore. Stop bothering people with silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."
"That is enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with these silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

"That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."
"That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

languages.text: "Das reicht, Nemi." {n}Einrich verzieht tadelnd das Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr seid kein Kind mehr, also hört auf, die Leute mit diesen albernen Reimen zu belästigen. Vergebt meiner Schwester, Lord Captain. Das war unangemessen."
languages.original_text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

traits.locale_text: "Das reicht, Nemi." {n}Einrich verzieht tadelnd das Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr seid kein Kind mehr, also hört auf, die Leute mit diesen albernen Reimen zu belästigen. Vergebt meiner Schwester, Lord Captain. Das war unangemessen."

languages.text: «Vale ya, Nemi». {n}Einrich la reprocha con la mirada.{/n} «Ya no eres una niña, tienes que dejar de molestar a tu gente con esos viejos cuentos. Perdone a mi hermana, Lord Capitán. Ha sido inapropiado».
languages.original_text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

traits.locale_text: «Vale ya, Nemi». {n}Einrich la reprocha con la mirada.{/n} «Ya no eres una niña, tienes que dejar de molestar a tu gente con esos viejos cuentos. Perdone a mi hermana, Lord Capitán. Ha sido inapropiado».

languages.text: 「そこまでだ、ネミ」{n}アインリッヒが不愉快気に眉をひそめる。{/n}「お前はもう子供じゃないんだ。その馬鹿げたリズムでみんなをイラつかせるのはやめろ。妹がすみません、ロード・キャプテン。実に場違いでした」
languages.original_text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

traits.locale_text: 「そこまでだ、ネミ」{n}アインリッヒが不愉快気に眉をひそめる。{/n}「お前はもう子供じゃないんだ。その馬鹿げたリズムでみんなをイラつかせるのはやめろ。妹がすみません、ロード・キャプテン。実に場違いでした」

languages.text: “行了，涅米。”{n}艾因里奇不满地皱起了眉头。{/n}“你已经不是孩子了，所以也别再说傻话打扰别人了。请原谅我的妹妹，舰长大人，她的话确实很不合适。”
languages.original_text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

traits.locale_text: “行了，涅米。”{n}艾因里奇不满地皱起了眉头。{/n}“你已经不是孩子了，所以也别再说傻话打扰别人了。请原谅我的妹妹，舰长大人，她的话确实很不合适。”

languages.text: « Ça suffit, Nemi, {n}crache Einrich avec un regard désapprobateur.{/n} Tu n'es plus une enfant, alors arrête d'embêter tout le monde avec ces fables ridicules. Je vous prie de bien vouloir excuser ma sœur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, son comportement est tout à fait déplacé. »
languages.original_text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, Nemi, {n}crache Einrich avec un regard désapprobateur.{/n} Tu n'es plus une enfant, alors arrête d'embêter tout le monde avec ces fables ridicules. Je vous prie de bien vouloir excuser ma sœur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, son comportement est tout à fait déplacé. »

languages.text: "Bu kadar yeter Nemi." {n}Einrich, onaylamaz bakışlarla kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Artık çocuk değilsin. İnsanları böyle saçma tekerlemelerle rahatsız etmeyi kes. Kız kardeşimin kusuruna bakmayın Lord Kaptan. Çok yersiz konuştu."
languages.original_text: "That's enough, Nemi." {n}Einrich scowls disapprovingly.{/n} "You are not a child anymore, so stop bothering people with those silly rhymes. Forgive my sister, Lord Captain. That was inappropriate."
